name: Giles the Picky Predator (2013)
description:
Entry to Ludum Dare 28 from a long time ago. One of my favorite games I ever made. From the GameJolt page:

Giles the Picky Predator is a game about a snake who LOVES to eat mice. However, they make him so full that he grows uncontrollably until he can get back to his snake hole.

This game was originally designed as an entry to Ludum Dare 28, with the theme "You Only Get One."

Tools: Game Maker, Paint.NET, SFXR, Ableton Live

Music: https://soundcloud.com/the_operator/sets/giles-the-picky-predator
